metadata.title: Women's G-Defy Trail Lane Mid Cut Clinically Proven Pain Relief Hiking Boots with Ankle Support
features: VersoShock Reverse Trampoline Sole Provides Ultimate Shock Absorption
Waterproof Upper Keep Your Feet Dry
Durable Toe Guard For Extra Protection
Mid Cut Gives Increased Ankle Support & Protection from Cuts and Scratches
description: Explore the great outdoors in comfort and style with the new Trail Lane hiking boot. From top to bottom weâ€™ve created a durable boot that will help ease the pain and discomfort of a long hike on the trail. Our Trail Lane has a supportive, contoured footbed atop the latest VersoShock feather lite sole. Fine-crafted, stylish and rugged, the Trail Lane is perfect for the long-distance or novice hiker. Shoe Weight: 18 Oz
